text: Dar dili kofiron tarsu vahm xohem afkand ʙa saʙaʙi on, ki ʙo Alloh cizero sarik muqarrar soxtand, hol on ki Alloh ʙaroi iʙodati on ʙutho hec huccate nafiristodaast. Holati kofiron dar dunjo; tarsu vahm ast az muʹminon. Ammo dar oxirat makonason va cojgohason duzax meʙosad. Va in hama ʙa saʙaʙi sitam va dusmaniason meʙosad. Va ci ʙad cojgohest
